title: KDF Fleece Lined Jeans Women High Waisted Wide Leg Baggy Jeans for Women Winter Lined Jean Pants
description: WARM AND COMFY FLEECE LINED: KDF Fleece lined jeans are made of high-quality denim fabric and ultra-soft fleece lining. Feature durable, stretchy, hand feels soft and comfortable. These Thick flannel fleece lined jeggings for women are a must-have to combat the cold weather.

ON-TREND WIDE LEG STYLE JEANS: Step up your fashion game with our wide leg jeans for women. These stylish and comfortable high waisted jeans feature a wide leg design that is on-trend and flattering. Whether you're going for a casual or dressed-up look, these jeans are suitable for various scenes and occasions. You can wear it to work, school, parties, outdoors, clubs, picnics, travel, dating, etc.

RETRO-INSPIRED FLARE AND BELL BOTTOM - Make a Statement: Make a fashion statement with our flare and bell bottom jeans for women. These retro-inspired designs add a touch of vintage charm to your outfit. The flattering flared leg creates a dramatic and eye-catching look, perfect for special occasions or adding a unique touch to your everyday style.

Highly Recommended Fleece Jeans: KDF thermal fleece lined baggy jeans are a must-have in any women's closet in the winter. There are Black, Navy Blue, Dark Blue, and Brown lined pants to choose from. More colors are coming soon. Our stretch warm jeans are a great gift for friends in this cold winter for Christmas and birthday gifts.

Size & Care Wash: Please check the size chart in the picture carefully to help you buy more suitable pants. Size from US 2 to US 20, and we are not using Amazon's size chart. Machine washable, better wash separately the first time, do not bleach. For more styles of jeans, please search KDF jeans
